en.description:
Tek Assault - Kavat: 60% chance for the Kavat to ignore Lethal Damage, instead gaining immunity for 4 secs

Set Bonus: Kavats create a 10m wide zone every 15 secs, which deals 50 damage/s for 8 secs.
